Class BoardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoardController

  • public class BoardController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will be used as the controller of the game board scene. It uses the MVC design and will work with the fxml scene file (view) and the Board Model class (model) to produce a working tic tac toe game for the user.
    Author:
    Teagen Kiel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gameGrid
      The variable to represent the grid pane that the game is played on.
      javafx.scene.control.Label gameLabel
      The variable which will represent the label which displays the game info to the user.
      private BoardModel model
      The model that will be used to store data for the controller and work with the view.

    • Method Detail

      • setPlayers

        public void setPlayers(Player player1,
                       Player player2)
        This method will set the players for the game. These player variables will hold the specific type of player needed when the user clicks whichever game will be played.
        Parameters:
        player1 - the first player specifying type desired
        player2 - the second player with type desired

      • gridClicked

        public void gridClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
        This method is the event handler for whenever the user clicks on a grid node of the playing field. It will use the player type stored in the model to make a move based on which node is clicked. It will also store data in the model for data pertaining to the game (move count, last move made, etc.)
        Parameters:
        e - the mouse event generated by the click
